definition: former Huairou county, now Huairou rural district of Beijing
bosom/heart/mind/to think of/to harbor in one's mind/to conceive (a child)

sentences.english: Located at San Du He in HuaiRou county, about 72 kms from down town Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 慕田峪長城位於懷柔縣三度河鄉，距市區72公里。

sentences.english: In the end, we proposed 11 recommendations and countermeasures for the sustainable development in Huairou county.
sentences.chinese: 最後，對懷柔縣可持續發展得出了11條對策和建議。
